com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization
Class VirtualizationClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization.VirtualizedSystemClassLoader
                  com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization.VirtualizationClassLoader

public class VirtualizationClassLoader
extends VirtualizedSystemClassLoader

A VirtualizationClassLoader is a VirtualizedSystemClassLoader that uses the child-first / parent-last strategy for resolving and loading classes.

A good introduction to the concept of classloading is here: A Look At Java ClassLoaders

Programs that use this ClassLoader are typically attempting to isolate sub-programs/applications, as an application server or container may. That is, this ClassLoader enables the Virtualization of applications in the same process.

Author:
Jonathan Knight, Andrew Wilson, Brian Oliver
See Also:
Virtualization, VirtualizedSystemClassLoader, VirtualizedSystem, DelegatingProperties, DelegatingStdOutOutputStream,
